p: Castor oil, caustic potash (KOH), anhydrous methanol, tetrabutyl titanate, tetrahydrofuran, 1,3,5-Tris (2-hydroxyethyl) cyanuric acid (THEIC), diethyl chlorophosphate, concentrated sulfuric acid, chloroform, dioctyl phthalate (DOP), propargyl bromide solution, potassium carbonate, sodium azide, N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF), acetone, cuprous bromide, 5,5-dimethyl-2,2-dipyridyl were bought from Nanjing Chemical Reagent Co., Ltd. PVC was bought from Hanwha.
